title: Romanian producer Ada Solomon elected chair of the European Film Academy board | Romania Insider
snippet: Producer Ada Solomon has been elected chair of the board of the European Film Academy, marking the highest level of representation the Romanian film industry has achieved within the institution.

title: Producer Ada Solomon elected European Film Academy board chair - AGERPRES
snippet: 14:11 - Producer Ada Solomon elected European Film Academy board chair

title: Romanian Producer Ada Solomon Elected New Chair of EFA’s Board - FilmNewEurope.com
snippet: BERLIN: Romanian producer Ada Solomon is the new chair of the Board of the European Film Academy, as Mike Downey’s term has come to an end. Her new deputy chairs are Dutch producer Leontine Petit and French consultant Matthieu Darras.

title: European Film Academy Announces New Board Appointments - FilmNewEurope.com
snippet: In 2026, the complete board of the European Film Academy will consist of Chair Ada Solomon Deputy Chairs Matthieu Darras and Leontine Petit Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Kosovo, Montenegro, North Macedonia, Serbia, Slovenia Danijel ...

title: Romania’s Ada Solomon elected chair of European Film Academy board | News | Screen
snippet: Romanian producer Ada Solomon has been elected chair of the European Film Academy (EFA) board.
